name: Candy Girl Makeup Artist- Candy Makeover
name_original: Candy Girl Makeup Artist- Candy Makeover
description:
Hey Girls! Now Chance to become a Sweetest Candy makeup artist. Run your own Candy Makeup Salon. Give your Client the Attractive makeup using different Makeup Tools. Here you can also experience like real cool Spa, Attractive Makeup, Cute Outfit and More in this Candy Girl Makeup Artist Salon. Help the client to choose a hair style, eye color, Attractive Makeup, and sweetest dresses. Get the best preparation for the Candy girl in the Candy Makeup Salon.

 

This is Candy Makeup, Candy Makeover, Candy Salon, Candy Girl, Girl Makeover, Salon Game for Girls, Cotton Candy, Beautiful Candy, Candy Nail art, Nail Salon, Candy Nail art Game, Free Salon game for Girls.

 

Features:

               

• Spa Section

• Makeup Section

• Dress up Section

• Many sweetest hair styles and candy hair colors to choose

• Lots of dress to choose for Candy Girl

• Huge Variety of Makeup Item like Lipstick, Eye Liner, Eye Lashes Blusher and More.

 • Share the perfect Candy girls via Facebook or E-mail with just one click
